summary: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding loon and his family of equally psychopathic killers.
cast: Jessica Biel|Jonathan Tucker|Erica Leerhsen|Mike Vogel|Eric Balfour|Andrew Bryniarski|R. Lee Ermey|David Dorfman|Lauren German|Terrence Evans|Marietta Marich|Heather Kafka|Kathy Lamkin|Brad Leland|Mamie Meek|John Larroquette|Scott Martin Gershin|Harry Jay Knowles
title: La matanza de Texas
